# ProSektorWeb LLM Documentation

# Project Overview
ProSektorWeb is a digital agency platform providing web design, SEO, and software solutions.

# Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL (Prisma)
- UI: Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI
- Auth: NextAuth.js
- I18n: next-intl

# Key Directories
- /src/app: App router pages
- /src/components: React components
- /src/features: Feature-based modules (CRM, Finance, etc.)
- /src/lib: Utilities and libraries

# Content Guidelines
- Tone: Professional, authoritative, yet accessible.
- Languages: Turkish (primary), English (secondary).
